steps: step 2: Click on link 'Phone' -> Navigate to page 'category/phone'
step 3: Enter input value in input field 'price min'
step 4: Enter input value in input field 'price max'
step 7: Buy items and place an order
step 8: Proceed to checkout after providing email and shipping info
step 9: Enter shipping details and continue to payment
step 10: Click on input field 'payment method id'
step 11: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
